name: NoCandyBabies!
description:
No Candy Babies is a shooter game made for a kind of "30 days"  GameJam. 

In the game you have the control of Yuu, an 8 year boy, who is in love with sweets.
All his candy savings are at risk when some babies with super powers start showing up in his house. For some reason they are atracted by his sweets and is your job to PROTECT YOUR BELOVED ones from getting eaten ( by others of course... )!

CONTROLS:
> Move: Up and Down arrows
> Shoot: Left Ctrl
> Submit: Enter
> Pause: Esc

This is a prototype and I intend to continue the develpment.

I hope you all enjoy it.
